Javascript

To validate checkboxes, use the jQuery Validation library.

Convert from UXFrame v1 to v2

  1. Remove .error class on form elements, and add .has-error class to parent .input-box elements.
  2. Remove the div immediately after the input[type="checkbox"] label label.
  3. Change .input-box to .form-group.
  4. Surround input[type="checkbox"] with their respective label tags. Put the input label text right before the closing label tag.
  5. Add .uxf-jquery-validate to the .uxf containing element if using validation.
